mapper.select: select A.dept_number, A.dept_parents ,A.dept_name , A.dept_level, A.order2 from (select dept_number, dept_parents, dept_name,dept_level, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(to_char(dept_level,'fm000')||dept_number,'/') order2 from department start with dept_parents = 'dept0' connect by prior dept_number = dept_parents) A where a.dept_number <> 'dept0' order by A.order2
